description.value: Having overcome countless challenges in your rise to power, your self-confidence isn't just bluster and brains; it's supported by empirical evidence! Your Shielding Arrogance reaction can now also trigger whenever a foe within range of your thoughtsense critically fails an attack against you or critically fails a skill check attempted against you (such as an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble} around you). Increase the number of temporary Hit Points you gain from @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.wI0g2nRfu2d0YFAd]{Shielding Arrogance} to [[/r 2d8]] plus your character level. Increase this by [[/r 1d8]] at 13th level and by an additional [[/r 1d8]] at 17th level.
